summary: A man discovers that his sister was a werewolf, and helps an investigator track down a gang of the monsters through the United States and eastern Europe.

Hunt|Sybil Danning|Judd Omen|Ferdy Mayne|Patrick Field|Jimmy Nail|Steven Bronowski|James Crawford|Jirí Krytinár|Ladislav Krecmer|Jan Kraus|Petr Skarke|Igor Smrzík|Ivo Niederle|Ed Kleynen|Stephen W. title: Aullidos 2: Stirba, la mujer lobo
